body: MC is pretty bad at Oldmaid so as punishment, his classmates dared him to make a girlfriend in less within a week or else he'll have to run laps around school with just his underwear on. He asks Blonde friend and was rejected. Insteady, she suggested to help him get one through a matching app. Somehow, she matched him with their class adviser. From this point, it's all just a classic troupe of "sensei, take my virginity" and "my dick can't calm down, sensei" Anyway, story ended with MC dating blonde. Looks like Blonde kinda found out that he fcked sensei. Yeah, it kinda didn't make sense lol. Maybe she felt pity for him cuz sensei didn't end up dating with him.
